sheep.input
Class Touch

java.lang.Object
  sheep.input.Touch
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.view.View.OnTouchListener
public class Touch
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.view.View.OnTouchListener

This singleton class tracks the state of the touchscreen. It also issues MotionEvents which may implementors of the TouchListener interface may subscribe to.
